DOC.criteria: Male ≥ 18 year ; female ≥ 50 year without childbearing potential ( confirm either : age ≥ 60 ; history hysterectomy ; hormone analysis serum : Estradiol ≤ 20 pg/mL follicle stimulate hormone ≥ 40 IU/L ) Solid tumor Adequate function major organ Failed previous cancer treatment Peripheral venous access Concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled disease Brain tumor Marked constipation
